price: На вас ће се слати огњени пламен и дим и ви се нећете моћи одбранити,
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
